Detailed Description

Speech Device. TODO: This should really be called SpeechAudioDevice, but there is an existing class with the same name. Hopefully that other class will be removed from APOXI eventually. murrayc.

BOOLEAN SpeechSimpleAudioDevice::Disable (   )  [virtual]
 

Stop the Speech device. If you specified TRUE for suspend_all_others when you called Enable(), then any sounds that were suspended at that time will now be resumed.

Returns:
Whether the device was successfully disabled.

Implements SimpleAudioDevice.

BOOLEAN SpeechSimpleAudioDevice::Enable (  BOOLEAN  suspend_all_others = FALSE  )  [virtual]
 

Start the Speech device.

Parameters:
suspend_all_others Whether all other sounds should be suspended (or stopped, if they can not be suspended).
Returns:
Whether the device was successfully enabled.

Implements SimpleAudioDevice.

BOOLEAN SpeechSimpleAudioDevice::GetMute (  BOOLEAN  uplink  )  const
 

Discover whether the uplink or downlink is muted.

Parameters:
uplink Whether the uplink or downlink mute status is being requested. Use TRUE for uplink and FALSE for downlink.
Returns:
Whether the mute was successfully retrieved.

BOOLEAN SpeechSimpleAudioDevice::SetMute (  BOOLEAN  uplink,
BOOLEAN  enable = TRUE
) 
 

This function is obsolete, use AudioDeviceBase::SetMute() instead. Mute the uplink or downlink. uplink Whether the uplink or downlink should be affected. Use TRUE for uplink and FALSE for downlink.

Parameters:
enable Whether the mute should be enabled or disabled.
Returns:
Whether the mute was successfully set.
